entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
